      • Icon

        public Icon()

      • Icon

        public Icon​(java.lang.String imageUri)
        Create a simple single state Icon from a URI string referencing an image.

        Acceptable URIs:

      • android.resource:///
      • file://
      • arc:!/
      • asset:/

Parameters:
imageUri - the URI string to the image
